name: Len'en Reiretsuden ~ Reactivate Majestical Imperial
description: Len'en Reiretsuden ~ Reactivate Majestical Imperial (連縁霊烈傳　～ Reactivate majestical imperial) is a vertical-scrolling danmaku shoot 'em up and the third game of the Len'en Project. It was made by Trick Nostalgie's sole member JynX and released for the Windows operating system. The first trial version of the game was sold at Winter Comiket 2013, and the updated public trial version was released on 19 March 2014. The full version of the game was released on 2 October 2014 as a free download.
